full_text: DROPS Christmas: Knitted DROPS angel in garter st pattern and angel in lace pattern in ”Kid-Silk” and ”Cotton Merino” DROPS Extra 0-1200 DROPS design: Pattern no ks-107 Yarn group A and B Measurements: Height: approx. 7.5 cm / 3’’ Circumference at the bottom: approx. 14 cm / 5½’’ Materials: For both angels: DROPS COTTON MERINO from Garnstudio 50 g color no 01, off white And use: DROPS KID-SILK from Garnstudio 25 g color no 01, off white 1 angel weighs approx. 8 g. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED Needle size 3 mm / US 2.5 – or size needed to get 23 sts x 32 rows in stockinette st with 1 strand of each yarn = 4’’ x 4’’ (10 x 10 cm). ANGEL: Worked in the round on double pointed needles. WINGS: Worked back and forth on double pointed needles, top down. Two versions: ANGEL WITH GARTER ST PATTERN ANGEL WITH LACE PATTERN
name: Ravelry: 0-1200 Christmas Cherub pattern by DROPS design
